name: Aogeik
description:
Kidnapped loved ones cannot easily find their way home, and it is significantly easier for them to get rescued. The kidnapped loved ones can get hurt or killed by monsters, animals, natural forces, and bad beings. Therefore, rescuing the kidnapped is urgent, and a definitive, difficult-to-find, and hard-to-navigate path exists to rescue them. The path has monsters, animals, natural forces, and bad beings. 

Only Part 2 - First Fight is complete, so it is available for download.

Part 1 - Capture 
Part 2 - First Fight 
Part 3 - Rescue
